inclusion.criterion: interested in starting HCV treatment at the time of diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential engaged in sexual activity that could lead to pregnancy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: must consent to use contraception and agree to pregnancy testing during treatment
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: HBsAg positive from pre-screening visit and no medically controlled hepatitis B virus (HBV) condition
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of hepatic decompensation (ascites, hepatic encephalopathy, or variceal hemorrhage).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current use of medications that is not compatible with SOF/VEL use, according to current prescribing guidelines, including amiodarone or a proton pump inhibitor exceeding 20 mg of omeprazole equivalent.
exclusion.label: not_met
